医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究揭示了虐待儿童的主要父母风险因素虐待儿童一直是乌克大学研究人员领导的两项独立研究的重点，他们研究了导致虐待儿童的父母的主要风险因素，以及后来生活中的行为影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/Research-reveals-key-parental-risk-factors-for-for-child-abuse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/research-reveals-key-parental-risk-risk-factors-for-child-child-abuse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1669d39d39-1f31-49ee-bbcd-499bcd-499bc6dd9d9d9a Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:20:31 -0500 Research reveals key parental risk factors for child abuse
遇到急诊患者死亡风险增加的致幻剂使用根据CMAJ发表的一项新研究，寻求急诊治疗致幻剂使用的人在5年内的死亡风险比一般人群高2.6倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/hallucinogen-use-link-----------------------of-mortality-in-grendational-engergerence-care-care-care-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/hallucinogen-use-link---------------------of-mortality-in-ergergency-care-care-care-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc62ddc2dc2-20c3-4c6e-a271-b25cca59bde4 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:13:57 -0500 Hallucinogen use linked to increased risk of mortality in emergency care patients
共发生的突变可能会限制KRAS G12C抑制剂在结直肠癌和胰腺癌中的有效性根据大型多培养地分析的最新结果，尽管没有对KRAS G12C抑制剂的抗性，但K骨G12C突变的结直肠癌和胰腺导管腺癌通常会带来其他与KRAS G12C抑制剂抗性有关的遗传改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/co-occurring-may-limit-effectives-of-kras-gras-g12c-inhibitors-in-colororororerororerorerorerorectal and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/co-occurring-may-may-limit-effectilence-of-kras-kras-gras-g12c-inhibitors in-colororororerororecorectal and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e880722a-6be7-4154-bd85-a676bbe3121d Mon, 03 Mar 2025 09:34:21 -0500 Co-occurring mutations may limit effectiveness of KRAS G12C inhibitors in colorectal and pancreatic cancer
睡眠方式可能表明脑损伤患者的隐藏意识在过去的十年中，几项研究表明，最近有四分之一的脑损伤患者可能具有一定程度的意识，通常对家人和医生隐藏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/sleep-patterns-could-indicate-hidden-couscisciscissness-in-brain-ingrain-injury-injury-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/sleep-patterns-could-indicate-hidden-councisciseness-in-brain-injuran-injuran-injury-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff6f38c4-be9a-461b-8305-296136d1b403 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 09:26:48 -0500 Sleep patterns could indicate hidden consciousness in brain injury patients
研究确定了JMJD1C在急性髓样白血病中的关键作用急性髓样白血病（AML）是最具侵略性和遗传复杂的癌症之一，其标志是未经检查的未成熟髓样细胞的生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-indistifies-key-reole-of-jmjd1c-in-ucute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-indistifies-key-reole-of-jmjd1c-in-ut--------------------------------------- ute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6218A245-9302-4D6F-9603-BE2D25AD1EC7 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 09:22:16 -0500 Study identifies key role of JMJD1C in acute myeloid leukemia
应力颗粒作为神经退行性疾病的潜在生物标志物应力颗粒（SGS）是瞬时细胞器，当细胞经历压力时形成，作为RNA代谢和细胞存活的关键枢纽。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/stress-granules-as-as-potential-biomarkers-for-neurodegenerative-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/stress-granules-as-as-potential-biomarkers-for-neurodegenerative-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79f9f5ec-01CE-4FAF-9C95-8DE4FE6799A2 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 09:18:21 -0500 Stress granules as potential biomarkers for neurodegenerative diseases
研究确定了SCA6诊断的关键遗传标记Niigata大学神经病学系以及国家神经病学和精神病学NCNP的国家中心已经确定了导致SCA6的CACNA1A基因的CAG重复单元（RU）的致病阈值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-indistifies-key-genetic-markers-for-sca6-diarosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-istifies-key-genetic-markers-for-sca6-diarosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a4444bfc-a9a2-4a3f-ada0-ada0-4c7f37274b66 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 09:14:46 -0500 Study identifies key genetic markers for SCA6 diagnosis
新的血液生物标志物可以彻底改变胆囊癌的诊断Karolinska Institutet和Karolinska大学医院的研究人员已经确定了血液中的生物标志物，可将胆囊癌与胆囊炎症区分开来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/new-blood-biomarkers-could-revolutions-gallbladder-gallbladder-cancer-diangnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/new-blood-biomarkers-could-revolution-gallbladder-gallbladder-cancer-diarning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a465703-962e-469f-99d3-99d3-9cfe8c2d5848 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 08:50:00 -0500 New blood biomarkers could revolutionize gallbladder cancer diagnosis
解决紧急和手术护理差距所需的紧急行动在世界卫生组织的三月号公告中发表的一篇新论文（1）的作者警告说，全球范围内必须加强紧急，关键和手术护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/urgent-action-action-neaded-to-address-emergency-engergency-and-surgical-care-care-care-gaps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/urgent-action-action-neaded-to-address-emergency-engergency-and-surgical-care-care-care-care-care-pacx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=427B88C0-7DC2-493E-924F-2AAD0DFA6300 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 08:46:13 -0500 Urgent action needed to address emergency and surgical care gaps
皮肤类正弦可以显示治疗冻伤伤害的希望冻伤是一种严重的冷损伤，影响了全球数百万，通常导致康复，疤痕和长期并发症（例如慢性疼痛和功能障碍）的长期康复，疤痕和长期并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/skin-organoids-show-promise-formise-for-treating-frostbite-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/skin-organoids-show-promise-formise-for-treating-frostbite-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A882B0DD-2141-4296-9BBF-B61075FACD0A Mon, 03 Mar 2025 08:29:44 -0500 Skin organoids show promise for treating frostbite injuries
